amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 118-12 to strike "at no cost" in the new paragraph (1)(A) of section 1112(e) of the ESEA, as added by section 104(2) of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jacobs amendment (A011) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jacobs.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jacobs amendment (A011) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
